text: Betrayal is a 1929 American silent drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Emil Jannings, Esther Ralston, Douglas Haig, Gary Cooper, Bodil Rosing. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Movies set in Switzerland
title: Betrayal (1929 movie)
